name: Youth Services
description: Precita After-School Program: Free afterschool program provides a safe space for youth ages 7-13, including: - Homework assistance - Cultural Identity - Leadership Development - Violence Prevention - Career Exploration - Sports and Recreation Safe Haven Program: Serves middle school participants to provide them with career path inspiration and training in 8-week cohorts in or outside of SFUSD schools. - Focusing primarily on low-income, undocumented, or at-risk youth. - Focuses on Green Energy,
fullDescription: Precita After-School Program: Free afterschool program provides a safe space for youth ages 7-13, including: - Homework assistance - Cultural Identity - Leadership Development - Violence Prevention - Career Exploration - Sports and Recreation Safe Haven Program: Serves middle school participants to provide them with career path inspiration and training in 8-week cohorts in or outside of SFUSD schools. - Focusing primarily on low-income, undocumented, or at-risk youth. - Focuses on Green Energy,
